Using Ripe

Source: vignettes/ripe.Rmd
ripe.Rmd
library(ripe)

replicate


stats::runif(20)%>%
  ripe(replicate,n=2,simplify=FALSE)
#> [[1]]
#>  [1] 0.031295379 0.643458967 0.013661030 0.344131159 0.007924523
#>  [6] 0.550650478 0.500259924 0.519035128 0.658481766 0.047915549
#> [11] 0.330859947 0.669776816 0.417565147 0.644755882 0.888610704
#> [16] 0.598685220 0.554380365 0.490649919 0.343049941 0.876297115
#> 
#> [[2]]
#>  [1] 0.79793221 0.71888570 0.76673785 0.54182769 0.01226299 0.11092193
#>  [7] 0.71713796 0.20563894 0.26655689 0.38973251 0.44507231 0.42922490
#> [13] 0.75492067 0.69907852 0.60480439 0.47034406 0.93399122 0.74880625
#> [19] 0.30507100 0.06759825

stats::runif(20)%>%
  sample(10)%>%
  ripe(replicate,n=3,simplify=FALSE)
#> [[1]]
#>  [1] 0.76216675 0.38171991 0.51843982 0.54428283 0.40735323 0.65003806
#>  [7] 0.51145702 0.09674766 0.71817795 0.54279409
#> 
#> [[2]]
#>  [1] 0.82906309 0.06920325 0.13672837 0.59279197 0.35359515 0.29099306
#>  [7] 0.54442412 0.59037800 0.26583800 0.50787336
#> 
#> [[3]]
#>  [1] 0.23799013 0.23393442 0.39992379 0.27099331 0.05441318 0.12885614
#>  [7] 0.97929772 0.94717919 0.97924023 0.01368300

stats::runif(20)%>%
  sample(10)%>%
  utils::head(5)%>%
  ripe(replicate,n=4,simplify=FALSE)
#> [[1]]
#> [1] 0.664781629 0.188213568 0.736056089 0.664253784 0.006012567
#> 
#> [[2]]
#> [1] 0.09865566 0.09261970 0.54919615 0.61376046 0.31045946
#> 
#> [[3]]
#> [1] 0.3289606 0.4230493 0.8994243 0.6237471 0.1375612
#> 
#> [[4]]
#> [1] 0.7526726 0.8521146 0.2794648 0.6533720 0.4160621

apply

stats::runif(20)%>%
  sample(10)%>%
  utils::head(5)%>%
  ripe(lapply, X=1:4)
#> [[1]]
#> [1] 0.24377716 0.53940050 0.26561950 0.04990526 0.16296510
#> 
#> [[2]]
#> [1] 0.8170457 0.5431697 0.8420079 0.6842763 0.9138911
#> 
#> [[3]]
#> [1] 0.1162753 0.4488344 0.3290738 0.2211932 0.1029588
#> 
#> [[4]]
#> [1] 0.4959740 0.1865300 0.8849475 0.6044553 0.2019361

mclapply

stats::runif(20)%>%
  sample(10)%>%
  utils::head(5)%>%
  ripe(
    parallel::mclapply,
    X=1:4,
    mc.cores = 2)
#> [[1]]
#> [1] 0.32762263 0.15283401 0.02825166 0.81103742 0.10436624
#> 
#> [[2]]
#> [1] 0.8027699 0.1257414 0.4789058 0.4891552 0.8500012
#> 
#> [[3]]
#> [1] 0.5217241 0.9488413 0.6112228 0.3188228 0.6782854
#> 
#> [[4]]
#> [1] 0.5056072 0.8998094 0.7681478 0.7881841 0.5243736

purrr

iris %>% 
  dplyr::sample_n(5) %>% 
  ripe(purrr::rerun,.n=3)
#> [[1]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width Petal.Length Petal.Width    Species
#> 1          5.8         2.7          4.1         1.0 versicolor
#> 2          5.1         3.8          1.5         0.3     setosa
#> 3          4.5         2.3          1.3         0.3     setosa
#> 4          6.9         3.1          5.4         2.1  virginica
#> 5          6.2         2.9          4.3         1.3 versicolor
#> 
#> [[2]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width Petal.Length Petal.Width    Species
#> 1          6.7         3.1          4.4         1.4 versicolor
#> 2          5.0         3.4          1.6         0.4     setosa
#> 3          4.9         3.0          1.4         0.2     setosa
#> 4          6.1         3.0          4.9         1.8  virginica
#> 5          6.7         3.1          4.7         1.5 versicolor
#> 
#> [[3]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width Petal.Length Petal.Width    Species
#> 1          6.1         2.9          4.7         1.4 versicolor
#> 2          5.4         3.7          1.5         0.2     setosa
#> 3          5.0         3.5          1.3         0.3     setosa
#> 4          5.1         3.8          1.5         0.3     setosa
#> 5          4.6         3.2          1.4         0.2     setosa

iris %>% 
  dplyr::select(1:2) %>% 
  dplyr::sample_n(20) %>% 
  ripe(purrr::rerun,.n=1)
#> [[1]]
#>    Sepal.Length Sepal.Width
#> 1           5.5         2.6
#> 2           4.9         3.1
#> 3           5.1         2.5
#> 4           7.3         2.9
#> 5           6.2         3.4
#> 6           5.1         3.8
#> 7           6.5         3.0
#> 8           6.1         2.8
#> 9           6.6         2.9
#> 10          5.4         3.4
#> 11          4.3         3.0
#> 12          6.8         3.0
#> 13          5.7         2.8
#> 14          6.7         3.1
#> 15          4.6         3.2
#> 16          6.9         3.1
#> 17          6.0         2.2
#> 18          4.6         3.4
#> 19          5.1         3.3
#> 20          5.0         3.4

iris %>% 
  dplyr::select(1:2)%>% 
  dplyr::sample_n(20) %>% 
  dplyr::slice(1:5) %>%
  ripe(purrr::rerun,.n=3)
#> [[1]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width
#> 1          6.7         3.0
#> 2          5.8         4.0
#> 3          4.8         3.0
#> 4          5.7         4.4
#> 5          6.4         2.8
#> 
#> [[2]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width
#> 1          5.4         3.4
#> 2          4.6         3.2
#> 3          5.2         2.7
#> 4          4.8         3.1
#> 5          6.7         3.1
#> 
#> [[3]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width
#> 1          4.6         3.6
#> 2          5.5         2.4
#> 3          6.9         3.1
#> 4          6.2         3.4
#> 5          6.4         3.2
